a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cancer incidence rate by age group, World, 1990 to 2021
Estimated number of new cancer cases per 100,000 people, in a given year.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Non-melanoma skin cancers are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
